titles: A pleasaunt newe nosegaye full of many godly and swete floures, lately gathered by Theodore Basille.
author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.
publisher: In Botulphe lane at the sygne of the whyte Beare, by Ioh[a]n Mayler for Ioh[a]n Gough,
notes: An issue of the 1542 edition (STC 1742) with canceled leaf N6. In this issue colophon reads "Mayler" and is dated 1543--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Devotional literature, English --  Early works to 1800.
